animeDescription: Pikachu's Winter Vacations are three series of videos, each composed of several Pikachu shorts. All shorts deal with winter and Christmas. This is the second series and contains Winter Games & Stantler's Little Helpers.
animeRelated: ['Pokemon', 'Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi', 'Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (2001)']
